about_the_game:
Bezz is a dullahan who's been looking for love in all the wrong places. When her roommate suggests she checks out a speed dating service in the city, she's hesitant at first but eventually caves. Join her as she meets the monster girls of her dreams.

Features:
  • ~30k word story with fully voiced dialogue!
  • 3 Romance Options (I mean it, Momo, stay off the page)
  • 7 unique endings with variations depending on your choices!
  • 14 beautiful illustrations!

Meet the cast!

Bezz, the Dullahan




Cindi, the Hellhound




Phos, the Phoenix




Chichi, the Scylla




Momo, the Succubus




Game Team:
  • TundraFlame - Director, Writer, Programmer/Compiler, Voice Director
  • T. Chase (@chasecubed) - Game Artist (Character, CG, BG, & UI), Editor, Writer
  • Angela Geiss - Sound Designer
  • DW - Editor, Writer
  • ExplorerRowan - Collaborator
  • IzzyCatz - Collaborator
  • Micah - Collaborator

VA Cast:
  • Amber Barile - Bezz
  • AkuMeowie - Cindi
  • CrabbieApple - Phos
  • Morphi / Angelyn Starr - Chichi & Momo
  • ChaseCubed - Additional Voices

Content Warnings:
  • Use of strong language

Developed by Dulcia Games

content_descriptors.notes:
There are descriptions of fantasy (non-permanent) death, and use of crude language/cursing.

There is also veiled nudity that is present with certain choices. It is non-sexual, and brief. Occurs twice.

detailed_description:
DLC & Extended Edition Under Development!

Momo DLC and the Extended Edition are under construction!

Including, but not limited to:
- Momo Route
- After & Interlude stories for all routes
- New CGs!

Stay tuned for updates! <3

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS10 High Sierra & Above
  • Memory: 934 MB RAM
  • Storage: 934 MB available space

name: Head Over Heels

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 & Above 64bit
  • Memory: 911 MB RAM
  • Storage: 911 MB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: A dullahan goes to a speed-dating event: Will she fall head over heels or trip up on her chances for love?
